content.question:
<math alttext="A g C l, solid, is in equilibrium with A g with a positive 1 charge, aqueous, plus C l with a negative 1 charge, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⇄</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>
The preceding equation represents the equilibrium of a saturated solution of <math alttext="A g C l, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> in contact with <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. All points on the curve in the following graph represent values of <math alttext="the molar concentration of A g with a positive 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>g</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the molar concentration of C l with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>C</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>l</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for which the product <math alttext="the molar concentration of A g with a positive 1 charge, times the molar concentration of C l with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>[A</mtext><msup><mtext>g</mtext><mo>+</mo></msup><mtext>][C</mtext><msup><mtext>l</mtext><mo>−</mo></msup><mtext>]</mtext></math> is equal to the value of <math alttext="K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></math> for <math alttext="A g C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mtext>g</mtext><mtext>C</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following provides the correct comparison of <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> and <math alttext="K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and describes the net process that occurs at any point in region <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math> (unshaded) of the graph?

choices.label: <math alttext="Q is greater than K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and dissolution of <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs.

<math alttext="Q is less than K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and dissolution of <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs.

<math alttext="Q is greater than K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and precipitation of <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs.

<math alttext="Q is less than K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and precipitation of <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs.

content.answer: <math alttext="Q is greater than K s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></math> and precipitation of <math alttext="A g C l, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
